dashboard.title: Welcome Back!
dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your application today.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.messageFrom: You have a new message from John Doe

landInventory.title: Land Inventory Management
landInventory.description: Manage your RS Numbers (Dag Numbers) and land plots. Track sold, allocated, and remaining land for each project.

rsNumbers.title: RS Numbers (Dag Numbers)
rsNumbers.description: Manage land parcels by RS Number
rsNumbers.info: Each RS Number represents a land parcel with its own total area. You can allocate plots to customers from each RS Number and track remaining land.
rsNumbers.feature1: Track total, sold, allocated, and remaining land area
rsNumbers.feature2: Manage multiple plots under each RS Number
rsNumbers.feature3: Monitor land utilization with visual progress indicators
rsNumbers.feature4: View all associated plots and sales for each RS Number

plots.title: Land Plots
plots.info: Plots are managed under their respective RS Numbers. Each plot represents a portion of land from an RS Number allocated to a customer.
plots.feature1: View plot details including area and status
plots.feature2: Track which customer owns each plot
plots.feature3: Monitor plot sale history and transactions

info.title: About Land Inventory System
info.paragraph1: The Land Inventory System uses RS Numbers (Dag Numbers) as the primary way to organize land parcels. Each RS Number represents a specific piece of land with a defined total area.
info.paragraph2: When you sell land to customers, you create plots under the relevant RS Number. The system automatically tracks how much land has been sold, allocated, and how much remains available.
info.step1: Create an RS Number with project details and total land area
info.step2: When a customer purchases land, create a new plot under that RS Number
info.step3: The system automatically calculates and updates the remaining available land
info.step4: View comprehensive reports on land utilization and sales
